content: held instep sts as charted in first row of instep chart work the chart for right or left sock same as on the leg then pick up 1 st at the bottom of the heel flap and knit it pick up 18 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the other 39 sole sts this is the new beginning of the round now you have 58 sole sts and 34 42 instep sts gusset decrease round 1 work instep in pattern as established i e work next row of instep chart sole ssk knit to 2 sts before end of sole k2tog round 2 work instep in pattern as established knit across all sole sts work these 2 rounds 13 times 26 rounds all together decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 34 42 instep sts and 32 sole sts foot continue instep in pattern as established while always plain knitting the sole sts work until foot is approx 2 inches shorter than desired length toe setup large size only shift the first 2 and the last 2 instep stitch over onto the sole needle s now you have 38 instep sts and 36 sole sts continue for both sizes starting at the beginning of the instep - for the larger size you ll have to knit 2 of those sts you just shifted to reach the new beginning of the instep - work 1 round like this k ssk knit to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k knit across all sole sts =>32 36 sts on sole+on instep toe round 1 decrease round k ssk knit to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k k ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k round 2 plain round knit around repeat these 2 rounds until you have 36 sts left on your needles then always work round 1 until there are only 16 sts left ©caoua coffee 2014 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved fidelio v 1 page 3/5 fidelio socks - by caoua coffee finishing leaving a tail of at least 8 inches break yarn and close the toe using kitchener stitch weave in the ends then knit a second sock and enjoy about this pattern fidelio leonore or the triumph of married love op 72 is ludwig van beethoven s only opera the setting is a political prison near seville in the 18th century the opera tells how the courageous leonore disguised as a prison guard named fidelio searches for her husband florestan who is wrongly imprisoned for his political beliefs when florestan s execution is imminent fidelio risks discovery and death for love finally freeing her beloved from his chains and his fellow prisoners from oppression the pattern of the socks shows vertical lines like the prison bars in the opera but if you look more closely you ll see them forming x and os representing the final triumph of love
